backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods, serving as an empty backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the comparison image feature is implemented in App.tsx and OurLittleComparisonSection.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files for reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/components/utilities imports plus OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radii, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'For My Ananya' that mounts the React app at the #root div via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages loading and modal state and composes all page sections including OurLittleComparisonSection in order.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Renders randomized animated heart SVGs floating upward from the bottom of the screen as a decorative background effect.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Page footer with animated floating hearts, 'Forever yours, Viaan.' signature in Dancing Script, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a pastel gradient background, floating hearts, hero image, main heading, and a glowing CTA button that triggers the romantic modal.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading overlay with a pulsing heart SVG and 'Preparing something special for Ananyaâ€¦' text that auto-fades out after ~2.9 seconds.
frontend/src/components/LoveCounterSecti: Interactive section with a circular counter that increments on button click, shows burst emoji animations, and displays encouraging messages as the count grows.
frontend/src/components/MusicToggle.tsx: A fixed floating button component that plays/pauses a looping background music track, showing loading and playing states with animated styling.
frontend/src/components/OurFutureSection: A scroll-animated section displaying a vertical timeline of romantic future milestones (e.g., dates, marriage) with emoji icons and sparkle decorations.
frontend/src/components/OurLittleCompari: A scroll-animated section showing a side-by-side comparison photo with a styled frame and an italic romantic caption below it.
frontend/src/components/RomanticModal.ts: A modal overlay component displaying a short romantic message with animated heart/ring emojis and a close button.
frontend/src/components/SecretMessageSec: A scroll-animated section with a password-protected reveal, accepting a set of pet-name passwords to unlock a hidden romantic message.
frontend/src/components/ThingsILoveSecti: A scroll-animated grid section displaying six cards, each highlighting a specific thing the author loves about their partner with an emoji, title, and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status. Includes an `InternetIdentityProvider` component that persists identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom React hook that uses IntersectionObserver to track when an element enters the viewport, returning a ref and `isVisible` boolean for triggering scroll-based animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and defining a pastel romantic design system via CSS custom properties, Tailwind layers, and keyframe animations (float, sparkle, shimmer, fade-in, etc.).
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with romantic custom colors (oklch-based pastel palette), custom fonts, border radii, box shadows, and accordion keyframes, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a romantic single-page website for Ananya (built with HTML/CSS/JS), listing existing features, architectural notes, known issues, and image requirements at schema version 7.
